name: The dark red boots of Shrije
data: It decreases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It decreases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It increases the users wisdom pitifully.
It increases the users intelligence slightly.
It has superb armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers a bit slower than avarage.
The past of these boots has strong bonds with the devils.
